name: azure-common
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.1.4" %}

package:
  name: azure-common
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: azure-common-{{ version }}.zip
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/a/azure-common/azure-common-{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: f8c8d97d0a7de202a47d7081c39c0e4a827c78900719d02c2ebe936e44ff152f
  
build:
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - azure-nspkg
  run:
    - python
    - azure-nspkg

test:
  imports:
    - azure
    - azure.common
  commands:
    - python -m unittest discover -p "test_*.py"

about:
  home: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-python
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: 'Microsoft Azure Client Libraries for Python'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ivoflipse
    - Korijn
    - Maxyme

about.summary: Microsoft Azure Client Libraries for Python
